bibl.title: New Christian Epitaphs from the Fayum.
bibl.note: I. Kom Aushim storage magazine Inv. no. 309. Funerary Stele for a Man Named Thenes. Fayum, sixth or seventh century. - II. Kom Aushim storage magazine Inv. no. 310. Funerary Stele for a Woman Named Kyra. Fayum, between the fifth and no later than the seventh century.
bibl.seg: Lincoln H. Blumell & Mohamed Hussen, New Christian Epitaphs from the Fayum.

I. Kom Aushim storage magazine Inv. no. 309. Funerary Stele for a Man Named Thenes. Fayum, sixth or seventh century. - II. Kom Aushim storage magazine Inv. no. 310. Funerary Stele for a Woman Named Kyra. Fayum, between the fifth and no later than the seventh century.
